meanings.sent1: The local community organized a bonspiel for all the curling enthusiasts.
meanings.sent2: The annual bonspiel attracted teams from neighboring towns.
meanings.sent3: During the bonspiel, the players wore colorful hats to add a festive touch.
meanings.sent4: The bonspiel was a battlefield of brooms and stones, each team fighting for victory.
meanings.sent5: The icy arena echoed with the cheers and shouts of the bonspiel participants.

meanings.definition: to participate in a curling tournament or competition
meanings.sent1: She trained hard to bonspiel with the best curlers in the region.
meanings.sent2: They decided to bonspiel together as a team for the first time.
meanings.sent3: The friends joked that they would bonspiel their way to the top, one stone at a time.
meanings.sent4: His determination to bonspiel shone through as he practiced tirelessly on the ice.
meanings.sent5: The coach encouraged them to bonspiel with passion and sportsmanship.
